item.title: sbt search maven plugin
item.description: What This is a blog post about sbt plugin to query search.maven.org tl;dr show me the code Why Most development tasks can be done without leaving your favorite editor/ide nor console. Writing Scala code is no different: sbt gives you a lot of power to run code and tests, to package and publish application. There is one small thing though, forcing you to leave that environment and go to a browser - to find the exact name of dependency for your project.
